name: She Wolf (PROTOTYPE)
description:
An early proof of concept for a first person shooter. Compatible with mobile devices and touch screens.

Controls - Touchscreen

  • Left stick Up/Left/Down/Right - move forward, left, backward, right
  • Right stick Left/Right - turn left, turn right
  • Right stuck Up - fire gun
  • Right stick Down - melee/use
  • Touch panel gun icons - choose weapon

Controls - Keyboard

  • WASD - move forward, left, backward, right
  • Directional keys left, right - turn left, turn right
  • Directional keys up - fire gun
  • Directional keys down - melee/use
  • Number keys 1, 2, 3 - choose pistol, shotgun, SMG

Controls - Keyboard + Mouse

  • WASD - move forward, left, backward, right
  • Mouse move - turn left, turn right
  • Left click - fire gun
  • Right click - melee/use
  • Number keys 1, 2, 3 - choose pistol, shotgun, SMG

Team

  • Jack Anderson: https://venstudios.itch.io
  • Cal Coulter: https://therealcally.artstation.com/
